sect2.title: Installation of reiserfs
sect2.para: Install reiserfs by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../reiserfsprogs-3.6.5-flush_buffers-bug.patch && ./configure --prefix=/usr --sbindir=/sbin && make && make install && ln -sf /sbin/fsck.reiserfs reiserfsck && ln -sf /sbin/mkfs.reiserfs mkreiserfs
